source: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_SEQ_00<tab>The Vath fleetfoot is examining the weapon stores with a concerned expression.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_SEQ_00<tab>Idaten regarde l'arsenal du hameau d'un air soucieux.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_SEQ_01<tab>The Vath fleetfoot tells you that the Vath's weapon stores are worryingly low. He asks you to help them restock by taking flintlocks from the nearby Gnath hive.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_SEQ_01<tab>Idaten vous a demandé de lui rapporter deux <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E8ACE0302 /var>. Allez à Loth ast Gnath et éliminez autant <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 09F20DF50302 /var> que nécessaire.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_SEQ_02<tab>You pry the Gnath's firearms from their cold, dead hands. Take them to the fleetfoot at Loth ast Vath.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez récupéré les armes convoitées par Idaten. Apportez-les-lui.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_SEQ_03<tab>The fleetfoot thanks you for the weapons. He goes on to explain how unnerving he finds the Gnath's shared thoughts and actions. Though they are of the same blood and breed, though all Vath were once Gnath, he finds it difficult to believe they are of the same race.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_SEQ_03<tab>Idaten vous a expliqué qu'il était difficile pour les Égarés de fabriquer des objets complexes comme des armes à feu, sans la conscience commune des Fidèles. Voilà pourquoi il doit se résoudre à les voler.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_TODO_00<tab>Slay Gnath firedrones and obtain Gnathic flintlocks.
TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the flintlocks to the Vath fleetfoot.
TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_IDATEN_000_000<tab>Though we hear not each other's thoughts, generous hunter, you somehow know that we need help. Our weapon stocks are wanting. We need more.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_IDATEN_000_000<tab>Kssss... Bon<var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((soir)) ((jour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((jour)) ((soir)) /var>)) /var>, vaillant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> chasseu<var 08 E905 ((se)) ((r)) /var>. Vous avez compris que j'avais un souci, même si je suis un Égaré.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_IDATEN_000_001<tab>I would make a request of you. Please bring us muskets with which to defend ourselves. You can take them from the Gnath nearby. Two would be sufficient.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_IDATEN_000_001Kssss, j'ai besoin de l'aide d'un chasseu puissant comme vous... J'aimerais récupérer des Fidèles. Pourriez-vous m'en rapporter deux?
Vous pourrez les prendre aux que vous vaincrez.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_IDATEN_000_010<tab>Please bring us two muskets. Procure them from the Gnath firedrones.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_IDATEN_000_010<tab>Il me faut <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8ACE0302 /var>. Deux devraient suffire. Ksss...
TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_IDATEN_000_020<tab>Ksss... J'aimerais récupérer <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8ACE0302 /var>. Deux suffiraient, je pense...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_IDATEN_000_021<tab>Thank you, hunter. With these we can arm ourselves─defend ourselves.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_IDATEN_000_021<tab>Kssss, merci, chasseu<var 08 E905 ((se)) ((r)) /var>. Les Fidèles peuvent agir de concert pour fabriquer ces armes en fondant le métal dans leurs grands fourneaux.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_IDATEN_000_022<tab>We are of the same blood as the Gnath. But even we find it utterly unnerving─the way they think as one, the way they move as one. It is hard to imagine us as the same people.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ221_01790_IDATEN_000_022<tab>Mais nous autres Égarés, n'avons ni le fourneau ni la con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce commune nécessaire à cette opération. Nous n'avons donc d'autre choix que de les voler... Ksss<var 1D /var>!
